forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 61. West wind around 26 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 7 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon, Downtown San Francisco basks in a rare moment of sunshine, the radiant glow tempered by the brisk winds that dance through the streets. The temperature hovers around a fittingly cool 61 degrees, a gentle reminder of the city’s coastal temperament. As the sun casts its golden hues upon the iconic skyline, enveloping it in a crisp, clear embrace, the safety of a light jacket is recommended, especially with the formidable west wind sweeping through at a vigorous 26 mph, occasionally gusting as high as 32 mph—a wind that whispers tales of the ocean’s mysteries as it caresses the city.

As evening approaches, the atmosphere will transition to a quieter setting, with mostly clear skies inviting the soft glow of stars to adorn the night. Temperatures will dip to about 51 degrees, ushering in a cool breeze. The wind will ease slightly, wrapping itself around you in a subtle embrace. With this delightful clarity, a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero offers the chance to witness the shimmering reflections of the city lights on the bay’s tranquil waters. Alternatively, a visit to one of the quaint cafés, where you can sip a warm beverage while the city hums softly around you, could prove just as inviting.
